parameters.name: DtsInstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the data migration, data synchronization, or change tracking instance.

>  You can call the [DescribeMigrationJobs](~~208139~~), [DescribeSubscriptionInstances](~~49442~~), or [DescribeSynchronizationJobs](~~49454~~) operation to query the instance ID

parameters.name: DtsJobId
parameters.description: The ID of the DTS task. The DTS task can be a data migration, data synchronization, or change tracking task.

parameters.name: Endpoint
parameters.description:
The database to which the password belongs. Valid values:

*   **src**: source database.
*   **dest**: destination database.

>  This parameter is required.

parameters.name: Password
parameters.description:
The new password.

>  This parameter is required and cannot be set to a value that is the same as the current password.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the DTS instance resides. For more information, see [List of supported regions](~~141033~~).

parameters.name: SynchronizationDirection
parameters.description:
Synchronization direction, with values:
- **Forward** (default): Forward. - **Reverse**: Reverse.

parameters.name: UserName
parameters.description:
The account of the source or destination database.

>  This parameter is required.

parameters.name: ZeroEtlJob
parameters.description:
Whether it is a seamless integration (Zero-ETL) task, the value can be:
- **false**: No. - **true**: Yes.
